files.patch:
@@ -55,4 +55,2 @@
-    if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU" = "xx86_64" || test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU" = "xaarch64"; then
-      if test "x$OPENJDK_TARGET_LIBC" != xmusl; then
-        BASIC_LDFLAGS="$BASIC_LDFLAGS -Wl,--icf=all"
-      fi
+    if test "x$LINKER_TYPE" = "xgold"; then
+      BASIC_LDFLAGS="$BASIC_LDFLAGS -Wl,--icf=all"
